statements: DELETE FROM auditing_configurations WHERE id = 1 AND configuration_name = 'Default';
DELETE FROM auditing_configurations WHERE schema_name = 'HR' AND security_measure = 'Encryption';
DELETE FROM Security_Logs WHERE success = FALSE;
DELETE FROM Financial_Data WHERE data_id = 100 AND company_name = 'Company A';
DELETE FROM Security_Measures WHERE measure_name = 'Firewall' OR measure_description LIKE '%encryption%';
DELETE FROM financial_data WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM table_1 WHERE id = 100 AND database_name = 'example_db';
